attacks.name: Shred
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Blade
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragon Nova-GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
